page.title: 08A Profile of Mr. Shepherd
page.content: Mr. Shepherd is a keen gardener. He also does extra jobs to earn a little bit more money. He owns a tractor in which he moves about in. He has a very large garden with plenty of flowers and vegetables. The vegetables he grows are Runner Beans, Broad Beans, Peas and Spinach. If you look at his flowers and vegetables you can see how well he looks after them. Round near the back of his garden he grows raspberries and apple trees. In the front he has a labernan tree and holly bushes. Because of all the flowers and other things he attracts lots of wildlife. He has a Shepherd Dog who goes with him wherever he goes.
